name: The Adventures of Captain Carrot
description:
'Tally-ho kids!
Are you ready for another carroted adventure? 
Staring your 3rd favorite cartoon vegetable?'

Join Captain Carrot and his trusty ward, Beet Boy, as they go on adventures throughout the Vegetable Kingdom!
Encounter a cornucopia of baddies, obstacles, and challenges as you traverse the first area: The Sleepy Stronghold.

The demo for this platformer set in a fantasy cartoon world contains a full area with 10 levels, a racing mini-game, old friends, two different endings and some new faces.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

All artwork, writing, and development were created by WhiteVault as a solo project.

If you enjoyed the Adventures of Captain Carrot's demo, please join us on Twitch to watch the rest of the game creation and join the Patreon to get early access to new levels & updates and input for upcoming areas.  

Follow WhiteVault on Twitch: www.twitch.tv/whitevault
